00050 template<typename T> class pinned_allocator;
00051 
00052 template<>
00053   class pinned_allocator<void>
00054 {
00055   public:
00056     typedef void           value_type;
00057     typedef void       *   pointer;
00058     typedef const void *   const_pointer;
00059     typedef std::size_t    size_type;
00060     typedef std::ptrdiff_t difference_type;
00061 
00062     // convert a pinned_allocator<void> to pinned_allocator<U>
00063     template<typename U>
00064       struct rebind
00065     {
00066       typedef pinned_allocator<U> other;
00067     }; // end rebind
00068 }; // end pinned_allocator
00069 
00070 
00071 template<typename T>
00072   class pinned_allocator
00073 {
00074   public:
00075     typedef T              value_type;
00076     typedef T*             pointer;
00077     typedef const T*       const_pointer;
00078     typedef T&             reference;
00079     typedef const T&       const_reference;
00080     typedef std::size_t    size_type;
00081     typedef std::ptrdiff_t difference_type;
00082 
00083     // convert a pinned_allocator<T> to pinned_allocator<U>
00084     template<typename U>
00085       struct rebind
00086     {
00087       typedef pinned_allocator<U> other;
00088     }; // end rebind
00089 
00092     __host__ __device__
00093     inline pinned_allocator() {}
00094 
00097     __host__ __device__
00098     inline ~pinned_allocator() {}
00099 
00102     __host__ __device__
00103     inline pinned_allocator(pinned_allocator const &) {}
00104 
00110     template<typename U>
00111     __host__ __device__
00112     inline pinned_allocator(pinned_allocator<U> const &) {}
00113 
00120     __host__ __device__
00121     inline pointer address(reference r) { return &r; }
00122 
00129     __host__ __device__
00130     inline const_pointer address(const_reference r) { return &r; }
00131 
00141     __host__
00142     inline pointer allocate(size_type cnt,
00143                             const_pointer = 0)
00144     {
00145       if(cnt > this->max_size())
00146       {
00147         throw std::bad_alloc();
00148       } // end if
00149 
00150       pointer result(0);
00151       cudaError_t error = cudaMallocHost(reinterpret_cast<void**>(&result), cnt * sizeof(value_type));
00152 
00153       if(error)
00154       {
00155         throw std::bad_alloc();
00156       } // end if
00157 
00158       return result;
00159     } // end allocate()
00160 
00171     __host__
00172     inline void deallocate(pointer p, size_type cnt)
00173     {
00174       cudaError_t error = cudaFreeHost(p);
00175       
00176       if(error)
00177       {
00178         throw thrust::system_error(error, thrust::cuda_category());
00179       } // end if
00180     } // end deallocate()
00181 
00188     inline size_type max_size() const
00189     {
00190       return (std::numeric_limits<size_type>::max)() / sizeof(T);
00191     } // end max_size()
00192 
00199     __host__ __device__
00200     inline bool operator==(pinned_allocator const& x) { return true; }
00201 
00208     __host__ __device__
00209     inline bool operator!=(pinned_allocator const &x) { return !operator==(x); }
00210 }; // end pinned_allocator
